Load a saved configuration. Use the name of the file in the examples folder.
Use null to use this file.
The netlogo model to be used for the simulations.
This model must be in the src/netlogo folder.
The scenario that will be used for the analysis.
This scenario must be in the simulationScenarios array.
The maximum time in seconds for the simulation to run.
If the simulation takes longer than this time, it will be stopped.
Global parameters for every simulation. To override these parameters,
for a specific scenario, add the same parameter in the scenario object.
SAR adaptation strategy name must match file name in scenarios folder.
Each scenario can have its own parameters that will override the global parameters.

simulationScenarios.name: no-support
simulationScenarios.description: There are no SAR robots in the simulation.

simulationScenarios.name: staff-support
simulationScenarios.description: The SAR always asks help from a staff member.

simulationScenarios.name: passenger-support
simulationScenarios.description: The SAR always asks help from a passenger.

simulationScenarios.name: adaptive-random
simulationScenarios.description: Randomly choose between asking help from staff or passenger.
